title: honor capsules
body: I just got my honor lvl 4 but I did not get a single capsule. Does anyone know the drop rate ?

replies.body: i just got level 5 honor and i havent got any honor capsules

We can't go giving out the droprates, other wise it wouldn't be much fun now would it! Keep in mind that honor capsules have a chance to drop anytime you might get a key fragment, as they replace the fragment with a capsule.

> [{quoted}](name=Darkeese Latifah,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OMkE3Euo,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2017-08-15T23:26:38.934+0000)
>
> Why was this new honor system even implemented?

its to promote sportsman-like conduct. The key frags and capsules aren't actually the point of the honor system, its just incentive to not be nicer in game. If you promise honor exclusive rewards It'll reduce the overall saltiness of players so the game is more fun and less rage inducing. The actual reward of the honor system is a reformed community, its just fueled with key frags and capsule drops.
Then what is the drop rate of key fragments?
good to know, ty for info
